price: Nhyira (Wura no) ne Nea Ahennie no wͻ Nensa mu no, Ɔno na Ɔwͻ biribiara so tumii.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī biyadihi al-mul'ku wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
